entry.title: PAT-1001 A+B Format
entry.content:
Calculate a+b and output the sum in standard format â€“ that is, the digits must be separated into groups of three by commas (unless there are less than four digits).

Input Specification:

Each input file contains one test case. Each case contains a pair of integers a and b where âˆ’106â‰¤a,bâ‰¤106. The numbers are separated by a space.

Output Specification:

For each test case, you should output the sum of a and b in one line. The sum must be written in the standard format.

Sample Input:

Sample Output:

Code
